HEY i got it to work. Basicly follow the instructions given, then actually run the installer to the directory where you copied the files, use '9GV5-FBRT-TJN9-FR6M-RS6C' when installing game. Once installed, you need to go to start >run > regedit. Then browse to:

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeSimsThe Sims 3 Showtime (only 64bit)

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWARESimsThe Sims 3 Showtime (only 32bit)

Mark "The Sims 3 Showtime" and hit delete! (Don't delete anything else)
 The run the game from the TS3EPO6 and voila! should work perfectly, hope this works for you, ive been trying for ages too i almost gave up hope, haha! GOOD LUCK!

I ran into two serious problem with this torrent..

the first one is:

I tried to patch the game (like the instructions said) and it gave me a invalid file error

Solution: if you have cracked your ts3w.exe then you will have to download the universal-super patch (its about 1gb) to update your game to version 1.32  Link:  (PC USERS ONLY) 

http://www.atomicgamer.com/files/96126/the-sims-3-patch-1-32-full-pc-all-regions#


my second problem:

This isnt the full rip of the game and only certain objects can be used.. The OBJECTS that have tested out that CAN NOT be USED are: Dj Booth, Genie Lamp or do Magic Tricks and stuff....

Solution:

ONLY DOWNLOAD THIS FOR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY (the test run to see how certain stuff look, and the new interactions) DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS IF YOUR LOOKING TO PLAY THIS DAILY.. If you want to play showtime daily then I would DOWNLOAD the FULL RIP... 

Full Showtime Rip Link: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7085218/The_Sims_3__Showtime_[FULL]___Games4theworld__
